title.rendered: Evelyn Lozada: Engaged to Carl Crawford!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

He’s known for stealing bases, but Los Angeles Dodgers leftfielder Carl Crawford has officially stolen Evelyn Lozada’s heart.

The couple is engaged!

Lozada, best known for starring on Basketball Wives and for her roller coaster relationship with former NFL star Chad Johnson, made the announcement on Instagram today, posting a photo of her engagement ring along with one simple word:

YES!

Earlier this month, Crawford was identified as Lozada’s baby daddy.

 

“I’m overjoyed and in complete and utter shock!” Lozada tells People. “What a different year and a half it has been – I’m truly happy!”

And who wouldn’t be with an engagement ring that looks like this? The thing is comprised of 14.5 total carats!

According to Evelyn’s rep, the proposal took place on Christmas Day and also took Lozada by total surprise.

“HappiestGirlInTheWorld,” the bride-to-be wrote alongside with another photo of the ring.

We send the engaged duo our very best wishes. They join Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union as a sports-based couple that is newly betrothed.
